entry.title: Bitcoin Remains On Top As Altcoin Season Fails To Gain Traction
entry.summary:
The cryptocurrency market experienced a significant rally last week, providing a much-needed boost for many short-term speculators to turn profits. Bitcoin led the charge, surpassing the $64,790 mark, though the momentum appeared to have eased by the time of writing.
This surge was mirrored across the altcoin landscape, with several cryptocurrencies, including TRON, Avalanche (AVAX), and Chainlink (LINK), recording impressive gains ranging from 20% to 30% within just seven days.
Despite these gains among widespread altcoins, Bitcoin continues to exert dominance over the entire market.
Bitcoin Increases Dominance: What Does It Mean For Altcoins?
The altcoin season has yet to build up steam since the beginning of the year as Bitcoin continues to receive the lion‚Äôs share of investo‚Ä¶

entry.title: Kraken Receives $100M In ETH From Ethereum Foundation Wallet: Impending Sell-Off?
entry.summary:
According to data from the on-chain transaction tracker Lookonchain, the Ethereum Foundation recently made a significant move by depositing 35,000 ETH, valued at $94.07 million, into crypto exchange Kraken. This substantial transaction has raised concerns within the Ethereum investor community, particularly since it occurred during a minor crypto market rally as the week came to a close.
The timing and magnitude of this transfer have led to speculation among investors, who are wary of its potential impact on Ethereum‚Äôs price and overall market stability. In response to these concerns, Aya Miyaguchi, the director of the Ethereum Foundation, clarified that the transfer was part of the foundation‚Äôs routine treasury activities.
She emphasized that such transactions are necessary for mai‚Ä¶

entry.title: This Hedge Fund Buys Meme Coins. Here‚Äôs Why.
entry.summary: Crypto hedge fund Stratos bought Dogwifhat (WIF) when it was just 1 cent and has since continued investing in meme coins. We spoke with Rennick Palley, founder of Stratos, to hear the firm‚Äôs perspective on investing in these tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 180 - BTC BACK DOWN, AGAIN
entry.summary: BTC ETFs: -$81m, ETH ETFs: +$11m. Crypto falls as markets react negatively to CPI print. BTC whale buying slows, death cross on weekly. Low CPI print could still lead to BTC ATH: Grayscale. Exchanges see $1bn USDT withdrawal. US government sends $584m BTC to exchanges. Apple Pay may soon allow USDC payments. Schumer vows to pass crypto regulation this year. Morgan Stanley discloses $188m BTC ETF holding. Vanguard say they won‚Äôt do BTC ETFs. Marathon Digital buys $249m BTC. DeFi rises as Aave hits weekly high in borrowers. BitGo continues to stress autonomy from Justin Sun. Binance returns to India.

entry.title: Shark Tank's Kevin O'Leary Welcomes Crypto Regulation, Slams Celebrity 'Shitcoins'
entry.summary: Whether it's celebrity meme coins or Tom Brady, Canadian investor and "Shark Tank" star Kevin O'Leary tells it like it is. In this interview with Decrypt reporter Andr√© Beganski, O'Leary breaks down his approach to the crypto market and why "cowboys" became a thing of the past. Amid crypto's "renaissance" period, he sees prediction markets and stablecoins as bright spots, while regulation looks inevitable for a maturing industry.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 179 - PUMP FUN STILL RISING!
entry.summary: Crypto rallies ahead of key CPI data today. $2bn more Mt. Gox BTC readies to moved. Jump transfers another $46m ETH to sell. SOL stablecoin TVL up $1bn in the last 3 weeks. Goldman Sachs show $418m BTC ETF. BTC ETFs will soon surpass Satoshi‚Äôs holding. ETH L2 transactions hit record 12.4m. Harris advisors have poor history with crypto policy. Bitget wallet overtakes MetaMask by downloads. Coinbase say cbBTC wrapped Bitcoin coming.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 178 - TRUMP AND ELON ON X
entry.summary: SOLETH down 10% from ATH. Grayscale ETH ETF shows no outflows. Bitcoin slump due to rising Kamala odds: Bernstein. Alt season won‚Äôt return until BTC above $70k: Hayes. PayPal stablecoin on SOL flips ETH TVL. 3AC files $1.3bn claim against Terraform Labs. Marathon to stamp ‚ÄòMade in USA‚Äô on mined BTC. Trump & Elon don‚Äôt mention crypto in interview. entry.title: Deadrop Co-Creator Discusses ‚ÄòShock‚Äô of Dr. Disrespect Allegations & Future Plans
entry.summary: More than a month after famed gaming influencer Dr. Disrespect was dropped by Midnight Society, the studio building the first-person shooter Deadrop, the team has finally broken its silence in an exclusive interview with Decrypt‚Äôs GG to discuss the move to remove the streamer from the company‚Äîand how the game can move forward.

entry.title: Gigachad: A Crypto Coin With An Alpha Male Mindset
entry.summary: Gigachad is a meme coin centered around a meme that originates from 2017 after a photographer posted a bodybuilder with an unrealistically insane body. He was later named ‚ÄòGigachad‚Äô by 4Chan users.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 176 - ETH LEADS THE CHARGE
entry.summary: ETH leads gains in majors, ETHE outflows slowing. Putin signs crypto mining bill. Tether mints another $250m on SOL. Tether plans to double staff to improve compliance. Turkey sees surge in exchange applications. SEC plans to appeal XRP ruling. Franklin Templeton launches fund on ARB. SUI leads altcoins after Grayscale fund announced. TIA rises 20%, will launch mainnet in September. STX will launch final Nakamoto Code this month. Coinbase questions CFTC prediction market rules.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 175 - THE FTX SAGA CONTINUES

Saylor personally owns over $1bn BTC. Dems launch ‚ÄòCrypto for Harris‚Äô group. Brazil approves first spot SOL ETF. Robinhood crypto revenue up 161%. Ethena launches stablecoin on SOL. Jump likely shut ‚Äòdevelopment arm‚Äô, not trading. Nomad bridge hacker moves $35m to Tornado. Metaplanet to buy $6.8m more BTC. Binance to list TON for spot. NASDAQ & BlackRock ask to list ETH options. ETH ETF inflows outpace BTC. BlackRock ETH ETF sees $900m inflows so far. New ETH L2 created ‚Äòevery 19 days‚Äô. $2bn of seized ETH transferred by Chinese police. Jump continues to exit ETH position. Move in Yen is opportunity to buy BTC: Hayes. Moonpay has highest volume day since April. Ronin bridge saved in 4000ETH white-hat hack. Bitcoin is pretend internet money: Tezos founder.

Jump Trading continues to liquidate holdings. Ethena founder confirms protocol has ‚Äòzero issues‚Äô. Binance launches native KAS mining. Cycle hasn‚Äôt even started yet: Cobie.

entry.title: Mog: The 4Chan Meme Now Worth $800 MILLION
entry.summary: Mogging started on 4Chan back in 2016 as a slang term to dominate another person. But now, eight years later, mog has redefined itself through an Ethereum meme coin. Crypto traders Aug and Slumpt often joked that they‚Äôd launch a cryptocurrency around the mogging meme but never really pulled through. That was until Aug decided to press the button.

entry.summary: BTC ETFs: +51m, ETH ETFs: +$26m. BTC bounces at $62k amid $300m liquidations. BTC volatility hits 2 month high. SOL flips ETH monthly DEX volume. SOL rumour claims insiders own 8%.
